title: Kimiiro × Liver ~Konya Mo Bell Ni Oshiete Kudasai~
alternative_title: キミイロ×ライバー ～今夜もベルに教えてください～
status: キミイロ×ライバー ～今夜もベルに教えてください～
description:
Description :
        Runa Kusakabe is a university student with a severe communication disorder. In order to change her life, she transforms herself into "Bell" and starts a video streaming service. The naturally beautiful, big-breasted Bell receives some outrageous requests. She answers them in all seriousness, but then one after another, the most outrageous happenings occur!
